name: Hotel Vaibhav Inn
description: Hotel Vaibhav Inn – a luxury business class hotel offering ultimate comfort and luxury with 24 x 7 front desk welcoming guests all seven days of the week. This 4-storied hotel is a beautiful combination of traditional grandeur and modern facilities. The 16 exclusive guest rooms are furnished with a range of upholstery and comfy bed to smoothen your stays. Vaibhav Inn hotel is attached to southern spice – a multi cuisine restaurant savoring your taste buds. Don’t forget to Check in to Vaibhav Inn if you have ever have to visit Khammam. Hotel Vaibhav Inn is the favorite choice for quick business traveler and for luxury family travel. All rooms at Hotel Vaibhav Inn comes in at competitive pricing with best in class hospitality and service.

name: Hotel Grand Gayathri
description:
Finding an ideal budget friendly guest house in Khammam does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hotel Grand Gayathri, a nice option for travelers like you.
You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer air conditioning, and you can stay connected during your stay as Hotel Grand Gayathri offers guests free wifi.
The guest house features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. Plus, Hotel Grand Gayathri offers an on-site restaurant, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.
If you're looking for a place to eat, Haveli Restaurant (1.0 mi) is a popular option that is within walking distance of Hotel Grand Gayathri.
Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out a park, such as Dhanavayi Gudem Park.
Hotel Grand Gayathri looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Khammam.

name: Hotel Athidi Residency
description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Khammam, Hotel Athidi Residency is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its budget friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Hotel Athidi Residency makes it easy to enjoy the best of Khammam.
Rooms at Hotel Athidi Residency offer a kitchenette and air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
Room service is one of the conveniences offered at this hotel. Free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Hotel Athidi Residency, free parking is available.
When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Hotel Kaveri, Haveli Restaurant, and Kaveri, which are some Indian restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.
If you are looking for something to do in the area, Dhanavayi Gudem Park (0.8 mi) is a popular attraction that is within walking distance of Hotel Athidi Residency.
Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Hotel Athidi Residency is sure to make your visit to Khammam one worth remembering.

name: Hotel S Park
description:
Hotel S Park is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Khammam, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
The rooms offer air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.
Hotel S Park features room service. In addition, as a valued Hotel S Park guest, you can enjoy an on-site restaurant that is available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.
If you like Indian restaurants, Hotel S Park is conveniently located near Hotel Kaveri, Haveli Restaurant, and Kaveri.
Best of all, Hotel S Park makes it easy to experience some great Khammam attractions like Dhanavayi Gudem Park, which is a popular park.
Enjoy your stay in Khammam!
